app.name: PixPersona
app.description: Transform your photos into stunning cartoon avatars with the power of AI.

common.error_during_download: An error occured while downloading avatars!

errors.fetch_credit_packages: An error ocurred while fetching credit packages. Please try again later.
errors.payment_generation: An error ocurred during payment generation. Please try again later.

beta_banner.title: Beta Mode
beta_banner.description: We're currently in beta testing! Explore and help us shape what's coming next.

file_picker.placeholder: Drag and drop to load image

buy_credits_modal.title: Purchase Credits
buy_credits_modal.description: Select a credit package to start creating stunning avatars ‚Äî each avatar costs (strong){cost} credits(/strong), with (strong)2 free retries(/strong) to perfect your look!
buy_credits_modal.no_credit_packages: There are no credit packages available for the moment.

share.title: Check out this unique avatars generated on {appName}!
share.description:
Just brought my digital persona to life with {appName}!
These avatars are perfect for adding personality to my LinkedIn profile, spicing up social media, or standing out in virtual meetings. Whether you're building a brand or simply want a creative twist on your online presence, {appName} avatars are designed to make an impact.
Generate yours at {websiteUrl}!

404.title: 404 - Avatar Not Found
404.description: We couldn‚Äôt find the page you were looking for. But don‚Äôt worry, there‚Äôs still plenty of creativity ahead!

subtitles.subtitle_1: Transform your photos into personalized avatars with {name}!
subtitles.subtitle_2: Upload, customize, and create unique digital profiles in seconds.
subtitles.subtitle_3: Fun, fast, and creative ‚Äî your avatar, your style!

feature_1.title: Lightning Fast
feature_1.description: Generate avatars in seconds with our powerful AI

feature_2.title: Customizable Styles
feature_2.description: Choose from various cartoon styles to match your preference

feature_3.title: Free Retries
feature_3.description: Generate your avatar up to three times, ensuring you get the perfect result.

feature_4.title: Privacy Focused
feature_4.description: Your photos are processed securely and never stored

step_1.title: Upload Your Photo
step_1.description: Select and upload any clear photo of yourself

step_2.title: AI Magic
step_2.description: Our AI analyzes and transforms your photo into a cartoon

step_3.title: Download Avatar
step_3.description: Get your new cartoonish avatar in high resolution

regeneration.placeholder: Don't like it? Please provide details on how you'd like the image to be regenerated. You can mention aspects like color changes, adjustments in style, pose, facial expression, background elements, or any other modifications you'd like to see.

messages.intro_typein: üöÄ Great choice! Now, let's bring your character to life.
messages.generation_details_typein: Each avatar generation costs (strong){cost} credits(/strong), and you have the opportunity to create up to (strong)3 avatars(/strong), with (strong)2 free retries(/strong) to make sure you get the perfect look!
messages.regeneration_details_typein: You have (strong)2 free retries(/strong) to fine-tune your avatar! Use them to make adjustments and get the perfect look ‚Äî no extra credits needed!
messages.style_typein: Please choose a style for your avatar creation! Select from options like (strong)Cartoonish(/strong), (strong)Pixelated(/strong), (strong)Realistic(/strong) or (strong)Retro(/strong). This style will guide the design and vibe of your character.
messages.image_typein: To create your personalized avatar, please upload a photo of yourself. This image will serve as a reference for designing your avatar with realistic details or in a stylized way. Make sure the photo is clear and shows your face for the best results.
messages.privacy_typein: Please choose the visibility for your avatar! Select (strong)Public(/strong) to share it with the user community, or (strong)Private(/strong) to keep it available only to you. This will determine who can view your creation.
messages.ongoing_generation: ‚ú® Hang tight, your avatar is coming to life!
messages.ongoing_images: ü™Ñ Your avatar is all set. Enjoy your creation!
messages.final_images: üñºÔ∏è Here are the three generations of avatars you've created! Each version is displayed below with its corresponding image.
messages.default_error: üö® Oops, something went wrong with the avatar generation. Would you like to retry?
messages.error: üö® Oops, {error} Would you like to retry?

CARTOONISH.title: Cartoonish
CARTOONISH.description: Embrace a fun and exaggerated look!

CLAY.title: Clay
CLAY.description: Sculpt your avatar with a tactile, 3D feel.

DISNEY.title: Disney
DISNEY.description: Bring the magic of animation to life!

FLAT.title: Flat
FLAT.description: Keep it simple with clean, 2D designs.

HAND_DRAWN.title: Hand-drawn
HAND_DRAWN.description: Add a personal touch with a sketch-like appearance.

NEON.title: Neon
NEON.description: Light up your avatar with vibrant, glowing effects.

PIXELATED.title: Pixelated
PIXELATED.description: Go retro with a classic 8-bit inspired look.

POLYGON.title: Polygon
POLYGON.description: Construct your avatar with geometric precision.

POP_ART.title: Pop art
POP_ART.description: Make a bold statement with vivid colors and patterns.

REALISTIC.title: Realistic
REALISTIC.description: Aim for lifelike detail and accuracy.

RETRO.title: Retro
RETRO.description: Throwback to vintage styles and nostalgic designs.

STICKER.title: Sticker
STICKER.description: Perfect for messaging apps and social media!

THREE_DIMENSIONAL.title: 3D
THREE_DIMENSIONAL.description: Bring depth and dimension to your avatar.

generations.title: Generations
generations.description: See all the cartoon avatars you've created on {appName} in one place.
generations.generation_ordinal_avatar: {index, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} avatar

latest_generations.title: Latest Generations
latest_generations.description: Explore the latest cartoon avatars created by users on {appName}. This page features a gallery of unique and trending avatars, perfect for inspiration or finding the next design for your social media or gaming profile!

thank_you.title: Thank You for your purchase!
thank_you.description: Your credit package has been successfully activated.

credits_pending.title: Credits Pending
credits_pending.description: If not enabled already, your credits will be enabled soon. Refresh the page to update and see your new balance.

what_is_next.title: What's Next?
what_is_next.description: Once enabled, your credits will be available in your account. You can use them immediately for all eligible services and features.
